entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
